modName: A Set of Saves MQ Done Legit JUST Reset to LVL 1 min world impact
summary: Based on Steptakers save game, Abiola, with the MQ done (legit play through, no console, min impact) this is a great start to just go through Skyrim and do what you want without the pesky MQ. Char was reset to Level 1 AFTER MQ was done, with minimal world impact.
descriptionHtml:
If you use these, I\'d love for you to upload a few pics!

Steptaker made this save: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5597 with the main quest finished and with minimal impact on the world. He then reset the characters level to 1, so you can have a fresh start minus the pesky MQ. He DID NOT use the console to finish the MQ. Which is great! He did, after finishing the MQ, reset the level to one. So you can level up, pick perks etc All as you want. Every other quest remains available and untouched!

Please feel free to give me feedback. I\'ll will prolly upload more to this if enough people want them!

After doing a play through of the game, I wanted to just enjoy being in Skyrim, doing what I wanted. This start has been fantastic for that. I used the Showracemenu command and created several new characters to play with starting from level 1 and no main quest to bother with! No bugs, no weird surprises. So here are 3 characters you might like to wander Skyrim with. 

Blackthorne (Imperial): For the evil Mage/Necromancer/Vampire types, I made him in the style of Rasputin, dark, sinister looking, not handsome at all, but not a mutant either. He oozes evil. 

Jurgan the Butcher (Nord): A true Nord warrior. Play him as good or Evil, whatever you choose this is a viking inspired character. He\'s a brute and he\'s a warrior. You don\'t get called the Butcher for being warm and fuzzy. 

Kar\'elle: Wood Elf . Always wanted to play as a wood elf, so I made her. I figure if Elves were attractive in LOTR, why not here. I did however make her look like she gets down in the action and not like a super elf model.  She seems realistic enough. Play her anyway you see fit! 

Required Mods (what I used)
ApachiiSkyHair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
CBBE http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554
All in One Face for Dawnguard Vampire and Vanilla Races - UNP - CBBEv3 - Vanilla (highly recommend) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17704
High Resolution Scars by Xenius http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4784
I Wash - New Skin for Skyrim by Blocky http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23

The ENB i use is Seasons of Skyrim http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23812
---
 From the Original Mods description: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5597
Main quest finished without the use of console commands skipping ahead (which means that Paarthurnax and Esbern will be around.)
 has all the unique weapons/shouts rewarded from the main quest
[Characters Inventory]
Nahkriin - The Dragon Priest\'s Mask before entering Sovngard
Axe of Whiterun - For slaying the dragon at the Western Watchtower
Gloves of the Pugilist - +10% unarmed damage gloves when entering the Ratway
Party Clothes/Shoes - Infiltration of the Thalmor Embassy
Golden Claw
Blackthorne has 1kgold and a Daedric dagger

[Shouts] - 2 Dragon Souls for use
Become Ethereal 0/3
Call Dragon 3/3
Cal of Valor 3/3
Clear Skies 3/3
Dragonrend 3/3
Fire Breath 1/3
Storm Call 0/3
Unrelenting Force 3/3
Whirlwind Sprint 1/3
[Choices Made]
Etienne Rarnis released from Thalmor Embassy
Malborn kept alive from Thalmor
Markarth for Riften
Markarth Jarl Switch: Jarl Igmund -> Thogvor Silver-Blood
Riften Jarl Switch: Jarl Laila Law-Giver -> Maven Black-Briar
Stormcloaks pay for the massacre of Imperial troops at Karthwastend

[RP] For those who want it :P or why are you done with the MQ & LVL 1?
Everybody: \"All hail the Dragonborn! Alduin is defeated!
Tsun: \"When you are ready speak to me to return to Skyrim\"
*Take the portal to Skyrim*
- 1 Month Later -
You awaken near the guardian stones, you have forgotten much about what has happened. Your skills and power have greatly weakened as you cannot remember even how to fight. You search through your items and wonder whose Golden Claw this is or this mysterious cube (Runed Lexicon).
*Dragon flies overhead*
You remember destroying Alduin and setting Skyrim free, although you also know that your job as Dragonborn has not finished... there is still so much more work to do. So you set off, trying to find out more about yourself and to finish your duty.
[Places Discovered]
Riften
Markarth
Whiterun
Bleak falls Barrow
Helgen
The Guardian Stones
Riverwood
Honningbrew Meadery
High Hrothgar
Peak of the World
Ustengrav
Solitude
Winterhold
Alftand
Windhelm
Ivarstead
Septimus Signus\'s Outpost
Western Watchtower
Sky Haven Temple
Karthspire
Markarth 

Just drop the save game of choice into the Skyrim save folder and load up and start fresh!

Big huge thanks to steptaker for making the original Abiola save game. Countless hours of new character adventures have been created from that, saving me the time of not having the MQ to bother with. Srsly, go endorse his mod if you like this one, he made it possible!

Thanks to:
steptaker for his Abiola save game
Bethesda for a great game
Every mod maker ever, All of them! Seriously,  without you guys, these games would not be as cool.
author: Jase180
